A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I never left a theatre more disgusted with a movie.  The disrespect they paid to the central character of the original trilogy is amazing.   They made Luke a soulless\, spineless\, empty vessel of a being.  In Return of the Jedi\, Luke had brass balls.  In this he's not epitome of nothingness.  He's not even a man.  At least make Luke a man.\n\nMovie was visually pretty though so I did give it 1/2 stars.
